attributes.action: reject the NICE ruling that limits the availability of Alzheimer's medication on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NICE have prevented access on the NHS to the drugs that relieve the symptoms of early stage Alzheimer's Disease. There is significant carer evidence that has not been taken into account, which would provide overwhelming evidence of suitability of this medication. Therefore, the NICE ruling limiting this drugs on the NHS should be rescinded with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
